metadata.name: SaaS Trial Welcome
metadata.description: Welcome new trial users and guide them through getting started. Drives activation and feature adoption with a clear 3-step onboarding process.

blocks.content:
Hi {customerName},

Your 14-day free trial is now active. Let's get you started!

☐ Step 1: Complete Your Profile (2 min)
Add your details to personalize your experience

☐ Step 2: Connect Your First Integration (5 min)
Link your favorite tools to get started faster

☐ Step 3: Create Your First Project (10 min)
Jump right in and see the power of {productName}

Need Help?

• Watch our video tutorials
• Browse the help center
• Contact support: support@example.com

Your trial ends in 14 days. Make the most of it!

The {companyName} Team
